means: 给（马等）装上挽具( harness的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: That horse has never been harnessed to a cart.
The Yellow River has been harnessed.
He went to the small stable where his horse was, harnessed it, mounted, and rode out to the beach.
sentence.Network_cn: 他走进拴马的小马厩，套上马具，骑上马奔向海滩。

PerfectNetExp.abs: then he harnessed him to the first cart and climbed up onto it .然后他给公牛套上第一辆车，并爬上了车。
harmonized 协调harnessed 上马具, 披上甲胄, 利用headed 有头的, 有标题的.
atomic energy has been tamed and harnessed for useful work ., 原子能已被征服并得到实际利用.
harmonized 协调harnessed 上马具, 披上甲胄, 利用headed 有头的, 有标题的.

list.abs: 汽车零件英文名称一览 ... 洗涤壶 Windshield Washer 配线 Wire Harness 高压线组 Ignition Dable.
落综档疵 (Harness Breakdown) - 这种情况指的是，由于织布机通丝停止工作而导致那些由通丝牵引的经纱向织物前面或织物后面漂浮 …
取而代之的是目前最受欢迎的『半身式安全带』（Harness）与『全身式安全带』(Body Harness)个人防坠装备。上述装备在人体坠落 …
错组织疵 (Harness Balk) - 这种织物缺陷是由于织布机通丝没有能够按照规定的序列来进行移动所造成的结果，从而导致纬纱在本来应 …

entry.def: If you harness something such as an emotion or natural source of energy, you bring it under your control and use it.

example.ex: ...the movement's ability to harness the anger of all Ukrainians...
example.tran: 该运动之疏解所有乌克兰人怒气的能力

example.ex: Turkey plans to harness the waters of the Tigris and Euphrates rivers for big hydro-electric power projects.
example.tran: 土耳其计划利用底格里斯河和幼发拉底河的河水开发大型水电项目。

entry.tran: （系在身上用以携带装备或限制其移动的）系带，背带
entry.def: A harness is a set of straps which fit under a person's arms and fasten round their body in order to keep a piece of equipment in place or to prevent the person moving from a place.
A harness is a set of leather straps and metal links fastened round a horse's head or body so that the horse can have a carriage, cart, or plough fastened to it.
If a horse or other animal is harnessed, a harness is put on it, especially so that it can pull a carriage, cart, or plough.

example.ex: On Sunday the horses were harnessed to a heavy wagon for a daylong ride over the Border.
example.tran: 星期天，马匹被套在一辆沉重的马车上，准备踏上长达一天的穿越边境之旅。

entry.def: People or things who are working in harness are working together in order to achieve a particular aim.

example.ex: At Opera North he will be in harness with Paul Daniel, the conductor appointed music director last year.
example.tran: 在北方歌剧公司，他将和去年指挥指定的音乐总监保罗·丹尼尔通力合作。

entry.tran: （常指停止工作一段时间后）正常工作的
entry.def: If you say that someone is in harness, you mean that they are working, often after a period of not working.

example.ex: You can rest for three or four months and then the longing for work will return and you will be right back in harness.
example.tran: 你可以休息三四个月，然后又会开始渴望工作，并能很快回到正常的工作状态。

means.word_mean: 1. brought under control and put to use;
